page.title: 19Toys in our homes
page.content: Toys are great fun for children. You can have dolls, box games, ball games too. There are teddies which are like dolls. There is leggo that you can build with to make cars and models. These are some of the toys I've got. Guess Who is a game where you describe a person. Hangman is a box gane and you make a word up and the person says the word. Fool is a box game and you have some cards with people on going to a party. Battle ships is a game when you have some little ships and pegs. Glow-worm glows in the dark at night when you go to bed. His head glows.{by Clare Bayley { and Clare Pearce
